name: Arachnid Descent
description:
You have found a cavern supposedly crammed full of valuable gems and crystals. To your horror you find it infested by skittering... crawling... SPIDERS!!!

⚠ ARACHNOPHOBIA WARNING ⚠

---------------------------------------------------------------------

How To Play:

Move vertically: A & D / Left & right arrow keys

Move down: S / Down arrow key

To play the game you must descend through as many floors as possibly. The level is infinite and the only way to stop is to be consumed by spiders.  Spiders will move erratically and not-very-intelligently but once they see you they will charge at you with ferocious speeds! Another lethal and scary thing is the mounds of sharp spikes littered around the level. One touch of the spike and... GAME OVER. There is one more variant of spider, the spider that sits upon a web will not attack but instead will shoot cobwebs at you to slow you down and make it easier for its fellow arachnids to find there lunch. The last thing is the spider eggs, these will spawn 10 spiders then disappear, you can also walk into them to destroy the nest so make sure it doesn't get out of hand!

Leaderboards:

After your run feel free to submit your score to the public leaderboard! You can submit with a maximum-12 character username. Make sure you save the name because if you get a higher score and submit it with that username it will overwrite your old score, showing the highest score you can. Please keep the usernames appropriate and kind. If I see a username is not polite I will delete it from the leaderboard.
